DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : To study difference dilation evacuation ( D & E ) procedure time follow overnight cervical preparation laminaria Dilapan-S™ . The investigator hypothesize procedure time less Dilapan-S™ . Secondary objective : To compare use laminaria Dilapan-S™ difference : ( 1 ) initial cervical dilation D & E ; ( 2 ) need mechanical dilation accomplish D & E ease dilation require ; ( 3 ) number osmotic dilator place ; ( 4 ) ability complete D & E procedure without cervical preparation ; ( 5 ) complication ; ( 6 ) pain side effect ; ( 7 ) patient acceptability ; ( 8 ) provider acceptability .
DOC.brief_title: Laminaria Compared Dilapan-S Cervical Preparation Before Dilation Evacuation 18-24 Weeks Gestation
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Seeking pregnancy termination 18 0/7 24 0/7 week gestation Eligible pregnancy termination Planned Parenthood New York City Able give inform consent English speaking • Active bleed hemodynamically unstable enrollment Signs chorioamnionitis clinical infection enrollment Signs spontaneous labor cervical insufficiency enrollment Spontaneous intrauterine fetal demise Allergy laminaria DilapanS™
